Text: Alfster? Wha' the hell happened there? lol
I had no idea this existed.  Thanks!
You're most welcome, Itto1972. I love it when that happens.
Is this the same content as the Epic book?

whaletail935, actaully, this IS the Epic book. I usually do a cross-check between whatever website(s) (in this case I think it was comicbookdb, could have been a wiki or Amazon, though) I'm working with and the book, but in this case I appear to have skipped that process. Apologies.
